A good concept and aesthetic, but tedious.  A very steep learning curve combined with an exhausting, repetitive grind obstructing progress.  Gameplay is okay, but actually getting quality engagement is frustrating and intermittent, as your time will be wasted with long queues, clowning, dull waiting around, QTEs rebranded as "skill checks" and lots of other exhausting nonsense.

takes a bit to learn what perks are good and takes even longer to unlock them all but the overall game is super fun. killer is a great time a good rush, but only solo, survivor is super fun with friends its not my cup of tea alone tho, ranking system is trash and you will get into games with super experienced people even when you are a low rank, devs kinda suck tbh they nerf stuff that doesnt need nerfed and buff stuff that doesnt need buffed, but the game is really fun and worth playing its cross platform too so you can play with friends on console HAPPY KILLING or surviving
bom

Really addicting to play with your friends, surviving brutal killers. Equally addicting to take your survivor frustrations out as the killer yourself. Unique styles of gameplay on both sides, great look and atmosphere, and surprising depth of strategy with the perks, items, and bloodweb systems. The game is constantly being worked on as well. DLCs featuring both original and licensed characters, as well as balancing always seem to be coming out. I would prefer they focus a little more on the latter, but it's difficult to also balance a game like this for every skill level. What it really needs is a larger player base to even out a lot of the matchmaking and I am sure it would smooth a lot of the "fairness" out. Overall, still extremely fun especially in bursts or during events (which cause a lot more people to play, it seems).
i love that in each round with another player as the antagonist you dont have an expectationfor a specific routine to each killer :P

This game is so unbalanced, the developers only care on getting money rather than fixing the game... I do not, I REPEAT I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME... If you are looking for a casual game time this is not the game (Killer players are notorious for being toxic). If you are looking for a balanced game this is not it (Hit box and game properties are so unbalanced). The only time you can enjoy this game if you have a friend of 4 plus you, besides that this game is degrading due to its developers.

A lot of people boast that it appears simple but has a surprising amount of depth and room for mastery- but even acknowledging that, I don't think this game is fun enough. The gameplay is really stale.. 

Longtime players can find enjoyment in high level play and game updates, but new players have to climb a few hills to see the game for what its worth and I don't recommend the process.

The game also has DLC characters that aren't free as well as a "Battlepass" feature, adding a few more hills to get a full experience.
I don't usually like playing horror games, I just like watching streamers play them. But after awhile of watching, I downloaded the game and I love playing it just as much as I love watching it.
